Not without actually trying to reproduce this on AIX. Mathieu is this 
reproducible on Linux Motif? I seem to recall you telling me that Eclipse 
under Motif is kinda flaky...

We are not testing linux motif.   This is only happening on AIX ;-( (not 
Solaris nor HPUX)

> We are not testing linux motif.   This is only happening on AIX ;-( (not 
> Solaris nor HPUX)

Probably there thread implementation in the VM.

Chris was going to limit the type cache threads anyway.
So he might have a solution for this by the EOW.

Not sure how to reproduce this one.  I'm going to disavow responsibility and
blame it on the search engine, since it seems to be choking on
JobManager.performConcurrentJob()?  Since I don't have access to an AIX machine
there's really not much I can do here.  Can someone confirm whether this is just
specific to AIX or affects all platforms?
Only AIX (specifically).  Assigning back to Bog.
Matheiu, is this still there in the latest build? RC3 + latest from head?
I will put that on my todo list.  Don't test AIX everyday ;-)
